ComicInfo.Summary:
Scream issue 15 - the final issue. The Thirteenth Floor and Monster both continued in Eagle comic (from issue 128 - dated 1 September 1984), all the other stories (except Tales from the Grave) reach a natural conclusion. The Monsters of the Deep poster remains unfinished...
Cover: Eric Bradbury (The Dracula File)
